messages.content: We have shots fired at Seven Oaks Cabin.
Copy, shots fired at Seven Oaks Cabin. Is anyone injured?
We have an officer down. I repeat, officer down.
Copy, officer down. Are you able to provide your exact location?
It's approximately half a mile west of Blast Road and 7-0's Road.
Copy, half a mile west of Blast Road and 7-0's Road. Medical assistance is en route. Do you have eyes on the suspect?
Negative, we do not have eyes on the suspect.
Copy, no eyes on the suspect. Can you provide the direction of the last known location of the suspect?
It's going to be on the north side of the road. Several pounds.
Copy, north side of the road. Will relay this information to the responding units. Is there any additional information?
Another officer is down, we need urgent assistance.
Copy, another officer down. Medical and additional units are on the way. Stay safe and keep us updated with any new information.
We don't have an officer. I don't know. I'm sorry.
Understood. Help is on the way. Stay calm and take cover if needed. Keep us informed of any updates.
